an3.146:4.1: “Someone with three qualities is cast down to hell.
an3.146:4.3: Unwholesome deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.146:4.4: Someone with these three qualities is cast down to hell.
an3.146:5.1: Someone with three qualities is raised up to heaven.
an3.146:5.3: Wholesome deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.146:5.4: Someone with these three qualities is raised up to heaven.”
